title: Vacuum Technology: Automation, Handling, Clamping | Schmalz
snippet: Schmalz offers you the right solution for various applications. You can find detailed information about the solutions on the respective industry pages or contact us directly for a personal consultation.

snippet: With over 10,000 products for vacuum technology in automation and manual handling, Schmalz offers the solution for your application. Discover now!

title: Vacuum Suction Cups - Schmalz
snippet: The suction cup product range includes suction cups in various shapes and sizes and made of various materials. Select the right Schmalz suction cup for your application.

title: Vacuum Components - Schmalz
snippet: Digital solutions from Schmalz help to fully exploit the potential of intelligent components, especially IO-Link devices. They can be used from commissioning to operation to service.
